text: 【UC Browser】 Privacy Policy
Effective date: [2022] Year [9] month [9] Day
Update date: [2022] Year [9] month [2] Day
【introduction】
You are welcome to use our products and services!

We know the importance of personal information to you. Your trust is very important to us. We will strictly abide by laws and regulations to take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information security and controlling.

Based on this, [UC Browser] service provider (or "we") formulates this "[UC Browser] Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy"/"this privacy policy") to help you fully understand you in youIn the process of using our products and services, how will we collect, use, share, store, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can manage your personal information so that you can make better choices.

Before you start using our products and services, please read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, we should focus on reading the clauses we logging in the threatening of the body/coarse body to ensure that you fully understand and agree to use it before starting to use.
The professional vocabulary involved in this policy, we try to explain to you in a concise and popular expression in order to facilitate your understanding.
If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the contact information at the end of this policy.

You agree that the privacy policy said that you have understood the functions provided by the application, and the necessary personal information required for functional operation, and give corresponding collection and use authorization, but it does not mean that you have agreed to open up additional functions and handle non -necessary personal information.The opening, processing non -necessary personal information and processing sensitive personal information, we will solicit your consent separately according to your actual usage.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: You agree that the privacy policy states that you can collect and use it accordingly, but it does not mean that you have agreed to open up additional functions and handle non -necessary personal information.

text: This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. Scope of application
2. Information collection and use
3. Provide information to the outside world
Fourth, your rights
5. Storage of information
6. Policy update
7. Protection of minors
Eight, contact us
Appendix: Related Definition
1. Scope of application
This policy is applicable to the various products and services provided by the [UC Browser] service providers with new forms that appeared with the development of technology.

We and affiliated companies have a privacy policy on the products or services that it provide to you, such as: "Book Banner Privacy Policy" and "Songta Shop Privacy Policy", and the corresponding products or services are applicable to the corresponding privacy policy.

In addition to the relevant information collection and use activities described in this policy, this policy is not applicable to other services you provided by [UC Browser Cooperator] and other third directions. Other services apply to the personal information collection and use rules that it explained to you.
2. Information collection and use
When you use our products/services, the personal information we need/may need to collect and use includes the following:
1. In order to realize the basic functions of providing you with our products and/or services, you must authorize us to collect and use the necessary information.
If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2. In order to provide you with additional functions to our products and/or services, you can choose to agree or disagree with the information we collected and used alone.

If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, which will not affect your basic functions.
We are here to remind you that we are committed to creating a variety of products and services to meet your needs.

Because there are many types and services we provide to you, and there are differences in the scope of the specific product/service selected by different users, the basic/additional functions and the personal information types and scope of personal information and use will be different. Please use specific ones.Product/service function shall prevail.
The specific feature scenarios we will provide you include::
(1) Help you become our member and account management
1. Basic member service
We provide you based on the UC browser account.
To create a UC browser account, you need to provide us with at least your mobile phone number and password (verification code).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In order to create a UC browser account, you need to provide us with your mobile phone number and password.

text: If you refuse to provide the above information, you will not be able to register the UC browser account, you can only use browsing and search services.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2. Third party authorization Login
In order to facilitate your login of the UC account, you can also log in to UC through third -party accounts (including Taobao, Alipay, Weibo, WeChat, QQ, Xiaomi, Apple).

In order to achieve the previous description, you understand and agree that we will obtain and collect your third -party account information from a third party, such as the information that you agree to the granted by your nickname and avatar on the authorization interface.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When registering and logging in with a third -party account, visit and collect your personal information after your authorization.

text: 3. Account certification service

When you use the functions or services that you can provide to provide, such as network disks, mini -games or live broadcast services, free stream card verification, and event reward tax deduction services provided by third parties, according to relevant lawsRegulations, you may need to provide names, ID numbers, and phone numbers to prove your true identity.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use the function or service that you need to authenticate to provide, you may need to provide the name, ID number, and phone number to prove your true identity.

text: You can refuse to provide it, but you may not be able to obtain related services, but do not affect the normal use of other functions and services.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 4. Additional member service
You can choose to further improve the account information of this product, which can provide us with your avatars, nicknames, gender, and birthday to obtain more personalized additional services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

Usage

text: (2) Provide you with browsing and search services
1. Web browsing

In the process of using our service, to identify the abnormal status of the account, understand the product adaptability, and provide you with the page display and search results that meet your needs.You need to obtain your storage read and write permissions, and may automatically collect your usage, including equipment information, service log information.

Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In order to identify the abnormal state of the account and understand the product adaptability, at the same time, based on the basic operational needs of web file cache, download, log storage, we need to obtain your storage read and write permissions and may collect your usage.

text: Please note that separate equipment information and service log information are information that cannot recognize specific natural person status.

If we use this type of non -personal information with other information to identify a specific natural person or use it with personal information, during the combination of use, such non -personal information will be regarded as personal information, except for obtaining your authorization.Or in addition to laws and regulations, we will anonymous and de -identify such information.
label: Important
Data Security

text: Used to display, push information and possible commercial advertisements.

Usage

(1) If you want to manage the personalized advertisements we send to you, you can enter the related page in "My"-"Settings"-"Privacy Settings"-"Personalized Advertising Recommendation Management";

In order to complete the order payment, you need to provide Alipay accounts, WeChat accounts or other payment methods for payment.

First Party Collection Information

Important

label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important

Important

(7) Provide you with security

In order to fulfill the statutory obligations of laws and regulations such as the "Network Security Law", improve the security of your use of us and our affiliates and partners, and protect the safety of your or other users or the public.Fishing websites, fraud, network vulnerabilities, computer viruses, network attacks, network attack risks, and more accurately identify the situation of violating laws and regulations or [UC browser] related agreements and rules.Safety SDK collects your equipment information, service log information, and may use or integrate your membership information, trading information, equipment information, service log information, and our related companies and partners to obtain information that you authorize or sharing according to law (wherein,We may collect MAC addresses, IMEI, and other device identifiers during the application background operation) to comprehensively judge your account and transaction risk, authenticate, test and prevent security incidents, and take necessary records in accordance with the law, and take necessary records.Audit, analysis, and disposal measures.

If our physical, technical, or management protection facilities are damaged, and the information is caused by unauthorized access, public disclosure, tampering or destruction, and damage to your legitimate rights and interests, we will launch an emergency plan in time and take reasonable and necessary measures.In order to reduce the impact on your personal.

Appendix: Related Definition
UC: It refers to a website and application of UC browser (domain name www.uc.cn).

UC browser service provider: Refers to UC's Internet information and software technology service providers Guangzhou Morality Computer Technology Co., Ltd. (Registration address: No. 38 room 305 room 306 room 307 room 307 room 307 room 307 room 307 room 306 room 306 room 306 room 306Room 308).
Related company: Refers to the related company of Taobao platform service providers disclosed by the latest listed company annual report of Alibaba Group Holding Limited.
Alipay: Refers to the main Alipay (China) Network Technology Co., Ltd. providing Alipay services.
Personal information: Various information related to the recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other ways, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Sensitive personal information: Once sensitive personal information is leaked or illegally, it is easy to lead to personal information that is harmful to natural person's personality dignity or personality and property security.Track information, and personal information of minors under the age of 14.
Child: Refers to minors under the age of 14.

Equipment information: We will receive and record the device -related information (including device models, operating system versions, device settings, MAC address and IMEI, IDFA, OAID, etc. according to your software installation and/or in use.Equipment identifiers, equipment environment, mobile application lists and other software and hardware feature information), related information related to the location of the device (including the GPS location you authorted, and sensor information such as WLAN access points, Bluetooth and base stations).

Service log information: When you use the products or services we provide, we will automatically collect your detailed usage of our service as a service log, including browsing, clicking, searching, collecting, focusing on sharing information, publishing information, publishing information, Crash log, performance log, IP address, browser type, telecommunications operator, use language, access date and time.
Decoration: Refers to the process of personal information processing, so that it cannot recognize specific natural persons without using additional information.
Anonymous: Refers to the process that personal information cannot identify specific natural persons and cannot recover.
